name: Vivillon
author: Mizue
flavor_text: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

abilities.name: Energy Color
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
